name: Seduce The King
description:
This Visual Novel takes place in a fantastical setting, heavy inspired by 17th century France under the watchfull eye of the sun king, Louis XIV. The player is dragged into the past by a botched demon summoning ritual, and get's stuck there under the thumb of the ruthless Athenaïs de Montespan. 

Seduce The King is a prototype that introduces a genderneutral player to the main love interests: Queen Marie-Therese, King Louis XIV, Chevalier Phillipe de Lorene and Athenaïs de Montespan. 

--

Seduce The King was created by three university students in Portugal, whose creativity was sparked after recieving the project proposal of making a game. 

This prototype was created by Ipovis, a team constituded by Eduarda Nóbrega, Isabel Ferreira and Martyna Kairaitytė. With the very appreciated help of Home Game Coder and Hanno Hellerich!
